name: EventEve.com
tag_list: free-online-invitations, engagement-party, event-planning-tool, invitation-templates, holiday-invitations, party-invitations, party-planning-tool, party-themes, birthday-party-invitations, polls, online-rsvp, potluck-parties, event-contacts, guest-list, e
description: Event Management and Party Planning Site
overview:
Event planning and party planning with EventEve.com is as easy as selecting an invitation design, providing event details, adding guests email-ids and sending via email & sms. Other features to enhance the event planning experience include:

  1. Creating Polls - Create polls to decide suitable date/time for your event, location, food, movie etc.
  2. Potluck - Create a potluck list and let guests select items to bring.
  3. Photos & Videos - Add event photos & videos to your event’s web page.
  4. Other features - Allow guests to invite others; add message board on your event’s web page.
  5. Find local party vendors.

Don’t miss checking out the Party Ideas blog.
